newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates moderately traded on call session.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates moderately traded on call session.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were moderately traded on Wednesday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. Eight barges traded on Wednesday versus no trades on Tuesday.
- Four barges, two each week of September 22-29, mid-Mississippi (McGregor and South), bid 190 percent of tariff, trade.
- Four barges, one each week of March, Illinois river, bid 170 percent, trade.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois, bid 110 percent, offered 130 percent.
- Two barges, week of September 22, Illinois, bid 170 percent, offered 180 percent.
- Five barges, one each week of September, lower Ohio River, bid 150 percent, up five percentage points, no offer.
- Eight barges, two each week of November, Illinois River, no bid, offered 205 percent.
